properties.name: solace.connector.pubsub.sourcesubscriptionname
properties.description: Name of the GCP PubSub Subscription to consume messages to be sent to Solace

properties.name: solace.connector.solace.desttopicname
properties.description: Name of the Solace Topic where the Consumed messages from GCP PubSub will get published

properties.name: solace.connector.solace.sourcequeuename
properties.description: Name of the Solace Queue to consume messages that will get sent to GCP PubSub

properties.name: solace.connector.solace.basetopic
properties.description: Solace Base Topic to be removed from the messages that will get sent to GCP PubSub
